

grep -rnw * -e "ARACNE/include/loki/yasli/yasli_traits.h"

q <- x
q[upper.tri(q, diag=T)] <- NA
q[1:10, 1:10]
quantile(q, probs=seq(0.995, 1, 0.00001), na.rm=T)

0.46270541 0.50545857 0.56995838 1.11590000 

99.992%

p <- x
p[p < 0.33531800] <- 0 

pg <- graph.adjacency(adjmatrix= p, mode='undirected', diag=F, weighted=T)
psif <- get.data.frame(pg)
write.table(psif, file = "sif.prueba.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )

pdpi <- aracne(mim =  p, eps = 0.1)
write.table(pdpi, file = "99.992.dpi.adj.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )

write.table(pdpi, file = "mir.752.99.992.dpi.adj.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )
pgdpi <- graph.adjacency(adjmatrix= pdpi, mode='undirected', diag=F, weighted=T)
pdpisif <- get.data.frame(pgdpi)
write.table(pdpisif, file = "mir.752.99.992.dpi.sif.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )

cat red.MIRseq.final.txt red.RNAseq.final.txt > red.final.752_2.txt

99.980%

p <- x
p[p < 0.2857994] <- 0
sum(x != 0)/2
[1] 9773668
> p <- x
> p[p < 0.2857994] <- 0
> sum(p != 0)/2
[1] 24865

pg <- graph.adjacency(adjmatrix= p, mode='undirected', diag=F, weighted=T)

write.table(psif, file = "sanos.mir.99.980.sif.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )

99.980%
0.14851600

p <- x
p[p < 0.14851600] <- 0
sum(x != 0)/2

pg <- graph.adjacency(adjmatrix= p, mode='undirected', diag=F, weighted=T)
psif <- get.data.frame(pg)
write.table(psif, file = "enfermos.mir.99.980.sif.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )

pdpi <- aracne(mim =  p, eps = 0.1)
sum(p != 0)/2
write.table(pdpi, file = "enfermos.99.980.dpi.adj.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )
pgdpi <- graph.adjacency(adjmatrix= pdpi, mode='undirected', diag=F, weighted=T)
pdpisif <- get.data.frame(pgdpi)
write.table(pdpisif, file = "enfermos.mir.99.980.dpi.sif.txt", sep = "\t", col.names= T, row.names= F, quote = F )
